title: Filipino-American History Month
context: [ยง8-18] Filipino-American History Month. The month of October shall be known and designated as &ldquo;Filipino-American History Month&rdquo;. The month of October shall commemorate the contributions of Filipino-Americans to the history and heritage of Hawaii and the United States. This month is not and shall not be construed as a state holiday. [L 2008, c 15, ยง2]
